title: Sexcapades: From Fantasy to Reality
itunes:title: Sexcapades: From Fantasy to Reality
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is talking about sex acts & how they actually happen vs. what’s portrayed on the big screen, & she is giving you tips on how to make them worth while. Plus, she’s answering your questions.  She shares hacks on...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is talking about sex acts & how they actually happen vs. what’s portrayed on the big screen, & she is giving you tips on how to make them worth while. Plus, she’s answering your questions. 

She shares hacks on car sex, shower sex – even sex on the beach – & how to make those all great experiences, ways both you & your partner can get back to intimacy after health issues, & what to do when a lifelong fetish gets in the way of your marriage. 


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
